Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LL-37(5-24) (LL-37 fragment, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, human cathelicidin, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (80%) toLL-25K: 25%, I=F=R: 15%.Activity: active against S. aureus (MIC 25-30 ug/ml), B. subtilis (MIC 30 ug/ml), E. coli (MIC 30-35 ug/ml), and P. aeruginosa (MIC 30 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Krishnamoorthy R, Adhikari P, Anaikutti P. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Design, synthesis, and characterization of non-hemolytic antimicrobial peptides related to human cathelicidin LL-37
